it.polimi.ingsw.model.windowpattern

Class WindowPatternDeck

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.windowpattern.WindowPatternDeck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WindowPatternDeck
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Window Pattern Deck This class is used as a collection of single Window Pattern Cards
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<WindowPatternCard> listofwindowpattern
      List containing all the Window Pattern card that can be chosen by the players at the beginning of game (4 for each player)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void createDeckofWindowPattern()
      Method used by the constructor in order to create the deck of Window Pattern Cards starting from imported strings from json
      java.util.List<WindowPatternCard> getListofwindowpattern()
      Getter of the list of window pattern cards in deck
      int getSizeWindowPatternDeck()
      Method used to retrieve the number of Window Pattern Card currently in the Deck
      void shuffleWindowPatternDeck()
      Method used to shuffle the Window Pattern Deck It changes the disposition of cards
      WindowPatternCard takeCardFromWPDeck()
      Method that returns a single Window Pattern Card from the deck It is meant to be used to retrieve cards from the deck and give them to players at the beginning of the game
      java.lang.String toString()
      Defined method toString that returns the description of the deck content
